attributes.action: Brexit Day needs to be the 22nd May 2019.
attributes.additional_details: Brexit could not be guaranteed with a long term extension. So to guarantee Brexit sign this petition and we can leave the EU on the 22 May and guarantee Brexit so we can get on with our lifes. If you agree, please sign this petition
attributes.background: Are you tired of Brexit? Are you sick of all the extensions? Parliament is saying we might have an extension of one year. Give Parliament the right to grant a short extension until May 22, then leave with either a deal or without one.May 22 needs to be Brexit Day so we can leave the EU.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like taken. The EU and UK Government have agreed an extension until 31 October. 

You could start a new petition calling for the UK Government and Parliament to ensure the UK leaves the EU on 22nd May with or without a deal if that is something you would like to happen.
